name: Dmcnelis.GitHub.io
body:
### Hi
Publishing this as a way to add some links to things that I want to share with folks

### Tech talks

#### Indy Big Data
4/27/2016 -- Changing the Tires on Your Big Data Racecar: Big Data is more than getting an initial system up and running.  Eventually you're going to need to upgrade or migrate your data, and that can be a daunting task.  This talk aims to demystify some of the process and lay a groundwork for successfully upgrading or migrating between versions and technologies.
[http://www.slideshare.net/DavidMcNelis/changing-the-tires-on-a-big-data-racecar](Slides)

### Authors and Contributors
This is solely content created by me, David McNelis.  The opinions expressed here are my own and mine alone and do not represent my co-workers or my employer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
